tweet: That was one of the worst games I have ever seen state play!
Getting ready to take my kids to their great grandparents before I go to the N. C. State game.  GO WOLFPACK!!!!
I shaved my head tonight, but I do not have any hair  so you want notice a difference.
So, I saved my head bald.  Not the first time, but lets see how long it takes for people  to notice.
My hands still smell like onions from cooking this morning.  Damn, I want that smell to go away.
